Extension.name: uploadAppendFileAttributes
Extension.initParam: This exit appends the size and modified datetimestamps to the update statistics document. This exit shall always goes with uploadFileAttributes preprocessor exit. The result statistics document shall have two elements added as first children, viz. size and modified.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: FileSizeParam
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: This is the name of the HTML parameter that stores the file size. This must be the same as that was given for the preprocessor exit uploadFileAttributes. Always literal.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: DateParam
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: This is the name of the HTML parameter that stores the modified date. This must be the same as that was given for the preprocessor exit uploadFileAttributes. Always literal.
